name: A Hard Pill to Swallow
description:
My first ever Ludum Dare submission for LD49.

Play as an unstable pill trying not to get digested, shoot yourself through an unstable person's bowels to survive. 

Controls:

Mouse Click and Drag to aim and shoot

X to reset level.

Esc for menu.

Patch Notes 1.4:

Fixed the bug on the food where players can no longer return to idle.

Enabled standard unity player for those wanting to play fullscreen.

Fixed bug where UI would be in center of screen.
